Text: Recall that a British Commercial Court had on August 16, awarded judgment in the sum of $9.6bn against Nigeria over a failed contract between P&ID and the Federal Ministry of Petroleum Resources in 2010.
Cause: a failed contract between P&ID and the Federal Ministry of Petroleum Resources in 2010.
Effect: Recall that a British Commercial Court had on August 16, awarded judgment in the sum of $9.6bn against Nigeria
Sentence: <e2>Recall that a British Commercial Court had on August 16, awarded judgment in the sum of $9.6bn against Nigeria</e2> over <e1>a failed contract between P&ID and the Federal Ministry of Petroleum Resources in 2010.</e1>
